net.proteusframework.cms

Interface Negotiable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NegotiableImpl

    public interface Negotiable
    Represents negotiation logic for a rendered PageElement.

    A rendered PageElement is a the top-level page element that is rendered by CMS. This is typically a non-embedded PageElement, PageElementPath.getPageElement(). It can also be an embedded PageElement if that element is targeted by a partial request.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getAllowedMethods

        Set<String> getAllowedMethods(CmsRequest<?> request)
        Get the allowed methods for the request. This is called on the rendered page element when CMS serves a resource.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        Returns:
        the allowed methods in upper case. NOTE: CMS automatically handles the methods OPTIONS and TRACE.

      • getAvailableLocales

        Set<Locale> getAvailableLocales()
        Get the available locales.
        Returns:
        the locales. May be an empty set.

      • getResponseDataType

        com.i2rd.cms.ResponseDataType getResponseDataType(CmsRequest<?> request)
        Get the response data type. This is called on the rendered page element when CMS serves a resource.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        Returns:
        the data type.

      • negotiateContentType

        ContentType negotiateContentType(CmsRequest<?> request,
                               List<net.proteusframework.core.net.LenientContentType> accept,
                               net.proteusframework.internet.http.useragent.UserAgent ua)
        Negotiate the content type. This is called on the rendered page element when CMS serves a resource.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        accept - the accept header content types. Take care when using this as some user agents send junk.
        ua - the user agent.
        Returns:
        the content type.

      • negotiateLocale

        Locale negotiateLocale(PageElementPath pageElementPath,
                     Set<Locale> availableLocales,
                     List<Locale> userLocales)
        Negotiate the locale to render a page.
        Parameters:
        pageElementPath - the request paths that corresponds to the page being rendered,
        availableLocales - the list of available locales. Never empty.
        userLocales - the list of user locales. This could be based on the User-Agent making the request, a logged in user, a cookie, etc. The list is ordered based on preference; locales at the head of the list are preferred over locales at the end of the list.
        Returns:
        the locale.
